thoughts.text: The Google search returned a website called Growing Global Citizens that provides information on the best places to learn a language abroad. I think I should use the browse_website command to gather more information on the website.
thoughts.reasoning: The Google search returned a website called Growing Global Citizens that provides information on the best places to learn a language abroad. I can use the browse_website command to gather more information on the website.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the browse_website command to gather more information from the Growing Global Citizens website
- Gather information on different languages and travel destinations
- Decide on a language to learn and a travel destination to explore
- Use the appropriate commands to execute my plan
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I don't get sidetracked by other interesting information and stay focused on my goals.
thoughts.speak: The Google search returned a website called Growing Global Citizens that provides information on the best places to learn a language abroad. I think I should use the browse_website command to gather more information on the website.

args.question: What are some of the best places to learn a language abroad according to this website?
